title: So It Shall Be Written (w/ Shane Gillis, Brian Six, Kilah Fox, Dante Nero & Justin Silver)
description: Shane Gillis on his sister’s Eqyptian husband and Coptic Christian wedding. Dante Nero tells the story of how he had to defend himself sexually against another man with knife. Jay describes to Dan the proper way to show your package in underwear.
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (Comedy Central)
